permission.description: permission to access the resource granted/denied

error.description: possible end-user authorization error, regardless of the HTTP status code. Can be one of Koha::Exception::SelfService, Koha::Exception::SelfService::BlockedBorrowerCategory, Koha::Exception::SelfService::PermissionRevoked, Koha::Exception::SelfService::TACNotAccepted, Koha::Exception::SelfService::Underage, Koha::Exception::SelfService::OpeningHours
